meta.content: Norwood Public Schools is a K12 public school located in the beautiful rural Western Colorado community of Norwood.

span.strong: Click here to view the 2020-2021 School District Calendar

a.title: Go to comments for 2020-2021 School District Calendar
Go to comments for PRESS RELEASE: Superintendent Search, 4-8-20

p.span: The Norwood School District is working closely with our local public health agencies as we monitor the global outbreak of Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19). Click the link below to go to the school nurse page for important information about Coronavirus and health tips for when to keep your child home from school when they are sick.

a.title: Go to comments for NPS Response to Coronavirus

span.a: Click here to view our current job openings.

a.title: Go to comments for Job Openings

p.span: The Principals' Report to the Board of Education from April 21, 2020 is now available on our website in effort to improve transparency and communication to our stakeholders. Click HERE and please take a moment to read what's happening in our district.

a.title: Go to comments for Principals' Report

span.p: One of the best ways to keep our school safe is to report concerning behavior. Talk to your kids and encourage them to download the free Safe2Tell app on their phones to report behavior by others that is concerning to them. They remain anonymous and they just might save a life. The information about the app can be found at https://safe2tell.org/safe2tell-colorado-mobile-app

a.title: Go to comments for Safe2Tell App
